text: "Stay Together for the Kids" is a 2002 song by Blink-182 and is the third and final single from their fourth studio album Take Off Your Pants and Jacket. It went to number 7 on the Billboard Modern Rock Tracks charts, number 13 on the UK Rock & Metal charts, number 85 in Switzerland and number 73 in Germany. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Blink-182 songs
title: Stay Together for the Kids
